short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cashback Ninja - The easiest way to save money and earn rewards while you shop online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cashback Ninja is a free browser extension that helps you save money on every purchase. Simply install our extension and shop as usual. Our smart technology will automatically search for the highest cashback rates available, so you can earn rewards on everything you buy. With Cashback Ninja, you'll never miss out on a great deal again.

Don't miss the pop-up in the top right corner of your browser. Activate cashback to get a portion of your purchase refunded.

### Pros of the Extension:
- Easy to install and use
- Automatically searches and applies cashback
- Works with thousands of stores
- Users will receive maximum cashback
- Available for free

The extension features an Auto-Cashback toggle. When turned on, cashback will be activated automatically.. 

Disclaimer: Auto-Cashback is activated by default. By installing this extension, you agree to this setting. Please note that Cashback Ninja uses affiliate links as cashback links.


Each user is assigned a unique identifier, which is used when making requests to the list of affiliate links. This identifier is necessary for resolving disputes and is not shared with third parties.
